alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Jefferson; Johnson; Warren; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Warren, Glascock, eastern Washington, north central Johnson and central Jefferson Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 916 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Shoals to near Riddleville to Pringle, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Gibson, Wadley, Davisboro, Stapleton, Bartow, Avera, Mitchell, Riddleville, Edge Hill, Edgehill, Downs, Grange, Stapletons Crossroads, Pringle, Moxley, Agricola and Bastonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
